Name: Cycled
About the game: In the aftermath of the Cataclysm, walls between parallel worlds collapsed. Malicious waves come out of the Epicenter and switch realities. Two unlike heroes unite their efforts to restore fractured worlds INTERSECTING REALITIES Every 10 second a wave changes everything on its way: your heroes, enemies and interactive environment. Adapt to constant changes and exploit them. TWO HEROES JOURNEY Your heroes start out as total strangers and the more you play them, the more united they become. They offer unique skills upgrades to each other and bring its own playstyle and game mechanics to the mix. Make a perfect combo out of them as you progress through the dungeon. EVER-CHANGING CHALLENGES Study your enemies to anticipate their actions, beware of synergies between foes of the same and alternate realities. Look out for traps and hazards. Defeat duo bosses. UNPARALLELED VARIETY Combinations of parallel worlds with unique environments and many types of enemies, procedurally generated dungeons, impactful choices, level up system based on team composition - all of it makes each run not like the other. Key Features Parallel worlds with unique enemies that behave and try to kill you differently Unique heroes with a vast variety of abilities. Find your most favorite combo! Countless traits and skills upgrades to tinker with Ever-changing game experience thanks to constant worlds switching, procedural dungeon generation, and randomized rewards
